divs: sighting detailsafter we returned home, i went on google to find places to report this sighting. i found arizona ufo website, and yours. we saw exactly what someone else saw, almost 3 years ago. we also saw more! this is the quote i copied (from a 2002 sighting on az ufo website), then i'll give full details of what we saw. occurred : 3\15\2002 19:15 (entered as : 03-15-02 19:15) location : glendale, az shape : circle ((nuforc note: report of missile launch from vandenberg afb. pd)) lighted object vaporized in a cloud of "fog" before my eyes. we saw a light like an airplane coming toward us. it had what looked like fog all around it with a light aiming toward the ground. suddenly it looked like it was getting covered with a big cloud of fog, then the fog began to clear and the light was completely gone. the light didn't go off in any direction. it seemed to vaporize. then the fog cloud disappeared. if there was any sound we were too far away to hear it. our report: date 9\22\2005 location: payson, az time: approx 19:20 (mst) while driving westward on highway 260 (from our home in chaparral pines) towards payson, we saw a huge, bright light over the hills that looked like the headlight (is there such a term) on a commercial airliner. it illuminated a large part of the skuy, and a big cloud of fog. our experience was exactly like what was reported above. however, after the light and cloud dissapeard, we saw what looked like about 3 spirals (kinda like a slinky) on the horizon, that were amber in color. the sky was pitch black on the horizon, yet this bands were very bright, and not moving. as we drove westward towards them, i tried to drive through part of town to get to a clearing for a better view. we couldn't get to a good clearing, and eventually lost sight of and could not see the lights again. my wife and i are both in our mid-40s, and very skeptical of these things...but we are convinced of what we saw...and frankly, a little freaked out about it all. feel free to contact us should you want\need any further information, or have suggestions on where else i should post this notice. cj & mary zilveti
